parameters.name: HideParts
parameters.description: True hides the original components after the join is complete, false shows them

parameters.name: ForceContact
parameters.description: True joins any coincident faces and intruding volumes, false does not

title: IAssemblyDoc.InsertJoin2
description: Constructs a feature from merged selected components.
signature:
System.Boolean InsertJoin2( 
   System.Boolean
HideParts
,
   System.Boolean
ForceContact
)

parameters.name: HideParts
parameters.description: True hides the original components after the join is complete, false shows them

parameters.name: ForceContact
parameters.description: True joins any coincident faces and intruding volumes, false does not

returns: True if feature creation was successful, false if it was not
remarks: When you use this method, SOLIDWORKS must be in Edit Part mode for the target part. You must also preselect the component parts to be merged into the edited part.
